mapper.select: select (case when job = 1 then '班主任' when job = 2 then '讲师' when job = 3 then '学工主管' when job = 4 then '教研主管' when job = 5 then '咨询师' else '其他' end) pos, count(*) num from emp group by job order by num
select case when gender = 1 then '男性员工' when gender = 2 then '女性员工' end name, count(*) value from emp GROUP BY gender
select c.name clazzName,count(*) num from student s left join clazz c on s.clazz_id = c.id group by s.clazz_id

select case when degree = 1 then '初中' when degree = 2 then '高中' when degree = 3 then '大专' when degree = 4 then '本科' when degree = 5 then '硕士' when degree = 6 then '博士' end name ,count(*) value from student group by degree
